meanings.sent1: The logoed shirt stood out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: She wore a logoed cap to support her favorite team.
meanings.sent3: The logoed backpack made him feel like a walking billboard.
meanings.sent4: Her logoed phone case was a constant reminder of her favorite brand.
meanings.sent5: The logoed sign was easily recognizable from a distance.

meanings.sent1: The logoed products flew off the shelves.
meanings.sent2: The logoed merchandise was popular among fans.
meanings.sent3: He felt proud to own logoed items from his favorite brands.
meanings.sent4: The logoed packaging caught the customer's eye immediately.
meanings.sent5: The logoed labels made it easy to identify the products.

meanings.definition: To put a logo on something.
meanings.sent1: She logoed the company uniforms with precision.
meanings.sent2: They logoed the promotional items for the event.
meanings.sent3: He logoed his car with stickers for fun.
meanings.sent4: The team logoed their jerseys for the championship game.
meanings.sent5: The artist logoed the mural on the wall beautifully.
